com.communote.plugins.mq.provider.activemq.settings

Interface MQSettingsDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MQDatabaseSettingsDAO

    public interface MQSettingsDAO
    Interface for accessing the configuration of the broker.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<String> getBrokerConnectorURLs()
      Use this this method to list all urls that the broker should be started on, hence the vm url will not be included, since it will be available always.

      Use this method to list all urls that can be used to connect to the broker

    • Method Detail

      • getBrokerConnectorURLs

        Set<String> getBrokerConnectorURLs()
        Use this this method to list all urls that the broker should be started on, hence the vm url will not be included, since it will be available always.
        Returns:
        broker connector urls

      • getBrokerConnectorURLsWithVM

        Set<String> getBrokerConnectorURLsWithVM()
        Use this method to list all urls that can be used to connect to the broker
        Returns:
        broker connector urls including the VM url (if isEnableVM() is true)

      • getBrokerName

        String getBrokerName()
        Returns:
        broker name

      • getDataDirectory

        String getDataDirectory()
        Returns:
        data directory path

      • getJmxDomainName

        String getJmxDomainName()
        Returns:
        the JMX domain name for the MQ broker

      • getJmxPort

        int getJmxPort()
        Returns:
        the port to be used for jmx connection

      • getQueueName

        String getQueueName()
        Returns:
        the name of the communote message queue

      • getReplyQueueNamePrefix

        String getReplyQueueNamePrefix()
        Returns:
        the name of queue to reply messages to

      • getSSLPort

        String getSSLPort()
        Returns:
        the ssl port to use

      • getTcpPort

        String getTcpPort()
        Returns:
        the tcp port to use

      • getUrlHostname

        String getUrlHostname()
        Returns:
        the hostname of the url to use

      • getVMConnectorURL

        String getVMConnectorURL()
        Returns:
        the vm url for clients to connect to

      • isBrokerStarted

        boolean isBrokerStarted()
        Returns:
        broker's state

      • isEnableSSL

        boolean isEnableSSL()
        Returns:
        true if SSL is enabled. default ist false

      • isEnableTCP

        boolean isEnableTCP()
        Returns:
        true to enable tcp connector. default ist false.

      • isEnableVM

        boolean isEnableVM()
        This flag is only relevant for the adapter connecting to the broker, since the VM connection is always available once the broker is started. It can be used to tell the adaper, not to use the vm and connect to another host.
        Returns:
        true to enable vm connection. default ist true.

      • isForceSSL

        boolean isForceSSL()
        Returns:
        the forceSSL. default ist false.

      • isForceSSLClientAuthentication

        boolean isForceSSLClientAuthentication()
        Returns:
        true if a client certificate is required (if it is a SSL connection, will be ignored for non SSL connections)

      • isJmxMonitoringEnabled

        boolean isJmxMonitoringEnabled()
        Returns:
        true to enable the jmx monitoring

      • isJmxRemoteEnabled

        boolean isJmxRemoteEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if jmx is enabled for remote connections and should be started on the getJmxPort() port

      • setBrokerStarted

        void setBrokerStarted(boolean isStarted)
               throws AuthorizationException
        sets broker's state flag
        Parameters:
        isStarted - the flag value
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • setDataDirectory

        void setDataDirectory(String dataDirectoryPath)
               throws AuthorizationException
        sets data directory path
        Parameters:
        dataDirectoryPath - path to set
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • setEnableJmxRemote

        void setEnableJmxRemote(boolean enableJmx)
                 throws AuthorizationException
        Parameters:
        enableJmx - the enableJmx to set
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • setEnableSSL

        void setEnableSSL(boolean enableSSL)
           throws AuthorizationException
        Parameters:
        enableSSL - true to enable the ssl connector
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • setEnableTCP

        void setEnableTCP(boolean enableTCP)
           throws AuthorizationException
        Parameters:
        enableTCP - true to enable tcp
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • setEnableVM

        void setEnableVM(boolean enableVM)
          throws AuthorizationException
        VM = virtual machine connector
        Parameters:
        enableVM - true to enable vm (which actually only relevant for the embedded adapter)
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • setForceSSL

        void setForceSSL(boolean forceSSL)
          throws AuthorizationException
        Parameters:
        forceSSL - the forceSSL to set
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • setForceSSLClientAuthentication

        void setForceSSLClientAuthentication(boolean needClientAuth)
                              throws AuthorizationException
        Parameters:
        needClientAuth - true if a client auth by certificate is expected on connecting to the broker
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException
